Title: WinRT Clipboard
Description: WinRT Clipboard simply allows you to share from any Windows App to your personal clipboard or to share what is already on your clipboard with another App.
HomeWiki:
WinRT Clipboard

WinRT Clipboard simply allows you to share from any Windows App to your personal clipboard or to share what is already on your clipboard with another App.

Simply install Clipboard from the app store and start sharing!
http://apps.microsoft.com/webpdp/app/clipboard/d12111fe-bfa8-4050-96c1-c6571e1f3230
